Posts.Content: May 28, 2013 10:40PM startingover12 wrote: As a woman it's very disturbing for me to deal with dry skin. I have been in remission for 1 year 6 months.When treatment is successful you want some type of normalcy afterwards. I to got wrinkles after treatment and they haven't went away. And my skin is extremely dry. Is there a good moisture cream or something to use?
Posts.Title: Dry skin & wrinkles after chemo? jenlee Dthayer
